TopicTitle: Are there any mods that have Sideways IVAs for the hitchhiker and mobile processing lab?

Articles.Content:
As the name implies, I am looking for a mod that adds a sideways Iva for the hitchhiker and mobile processing lab, because on my space station those parts are sideways, and it doesn’t look quite right.

Edited February 21, 2021 by DaBakonAder
